document.full_text: japan's mizuho bank  said on thursday that all of its automatic teller machines (atm) throughout japan were working again after system glitches caused suspension earlier in the day.
document.title: mizuho says atms working again across japan
lines_and_colors: japan's mizuho bank  said on thursday that all of its automatic teller machines (atm) throughout japan were working again after system glitches caused suspension earlier in the day.
